title: the Glacial Ravager
intro: Fenrir Vánagandr is a cursed guardian of the high peaks of Jötunheimr. Neither fully giant nor fully beast, he stalks the blizzard-choked passes, hunting those who dare trespass on the sacred frost. He doesn't just kill his prey; he freezes their blood in their veins until they can no longer lift their weapons to resist.

abilities.name: Frost Armour
abilities.details:
Fenrir generates a layer of frost over his fur every now and then. This armour grants him a [ar]flat damage reduction[/] against [ar]basic attacks[/] and minor [mr]magical resistance[/].

When Fenrir is hit by three basic attacks or a displacement effect by an enemy hero, it shatters, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to nearby enemies and applying three stacks of Frost.

Enemies with Frost have their [db]movement speed[/] reduced, stacking up to eight times.

abilities.name: Glacial Slash
abilities.details:
Fenrir slashes his claws in front of him, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [ap]magical power[/]) and applying two additional stacks of Frost on the target.

If the target has five or more stacks, this ability [bf]heals[/] Fenrir for a portion of his missing health.

If the target has eight stacks, this ability deals additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/] and target's [db]maximum health[/]).

abilities.name: Boreal Breath
abilities.details:
Fenrir exhales a blast of freezing wind in a cone for a short duration.

Enemies caught in the breath take [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) every half of second and have their [db]attack speed[/] reduced.

Each tick of damage also applies a stack of Frost (up to three stacks per ability's full duration).

abilities.name: Snow Ball
abilities.details:
Fenrir conjures a snowball that rolls in a target direction. As it travels, it grows in size, increasing its damage and impact radius.

Upon contact with an enemy hero, it explodes, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [ap]magical power[/]) and [db]knocking up[/] enemies hit.

abilities.name: Winter Is Coming
abilities.details:
Fenrir lets out a blood-curdling howl, causing a localised blizzard to swirl around him for a duration, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and applying a stack of Frost per tick of damage (up to twelve stacks per ability's full duration).

In addition, he gains increased [bf]size[/], [bf]range[/] and his Frost Armour cannot be shattered (if Fenrir does not currently have Frost Armour, using this ability instantly grants him the armour).
